page.title: 06HOMES
page.content: IN STURMINSTER MARSHALL HOUSES ARE BEING BUILT AND THE VILLAGE IS GETTING BIGGER AND BIGGER BUT THERE ARE STILL LOTS OF FIELDS AROUND US. SOME HOUSES ARE STILL STANDING TODAY AND THEY WERE BUILT HUNDREDS OF YEARS AGO.TODAY THE HOUSES ARE BUILT OF TWO WALLS OF BRICK WITH A SPACE BETWEEN THEM THIS IS A CAVITY WALL. THE INSIDE WALLS ARE BUILT OF BLOCKS.INSIDE SOME HOUSES ARE DAMP AND MOULDY BUT MOST PEOPLE NOW HAVE CENTRAL HEATING OR ELECTRIC COOKERS BUT SOME PEOPLE STILL USE A COAL FIRED OVEN LIKE A RAYBURN. ALMOST ALL HOMES HAVE TELEVISION SETS AND MANY HAVE VIDEO RECORDERS.SOME PEOPLE HAVE SMALL BATHROOMS BUT THERE ARE FEW HOUSES WITHOUT BATHROOMS.
